input.params.delta_x.helper: Please fill in 0 if no change
input.params.delta_y.helper: Please fill in 0 if no change
input.creaseMode.helper: Type of Arc to be supplied as the baseline of creasing Arcs
input.params.framerate.helper: The larger the size, the smoother the effect, but it will increase the size of the chart. Default 60.0
input.params.fake_note_t.helper: If a display error occurs, try adjusting it. Default 999999.0
最小公倍数过大（例如《Fracture Ray》FTR）时算法会炸掉，这时可以对: The algorithm blows up when the LCM is too large (e.g. Fracture Ray FTR). In which case you can align it once for each note time value, then it will works.
下面的参数控制缓动曲线，当缓动类型为“b”时可以提供两个控制点作为参数，进行更精: The following parameters control the easing curve. When the easing type is "b", two control points can be provided as parameters for finer control.
控制点默认值为: The default value of the control point is
你可以在这个网站了解和调试贝塞尔曲线：: You can try your cubic bezier at this site:
下面的参数用于控制物件与z轴的距离（离玩家方向更远+/更近-）。: The following parameters are used to adjust the distance between note and judgement plane(Further(+)/closer(-) to player).
同时，也可以借此处的设置实现物件在z轴上的平移，填写方式与在x、y轴上的控制参数: However, you can realize the translation effect along z-axis with similar parameters to x and y axis.
下面是一些个性化的设置。: The following are some personalized parameters.
生成结果已复制到剪贴板: The result is copied to the clipboard!
结果已生成，但是复制失败。请检查历史记录面板。: The result has been generated, but copying failed. Please check the History panel.
验证错误，请检查填写的数据格式: Validation error, please check the format of the filled data.
请检查网络连接: Network error, please check your network connection.
在提交之前...至少动点什么吧？: Just input something. It's not that difficult.
input.params.arctap.helper: Arc tap timings, separate by comma","
除了Arcaea自带的缓动类型之外，AFF工具箱还预置了大量常用的缓动类型，你可: In addition to the easing types that come with Arcaea, the AFF Toolbox comes with a large number of commonly used easing types pre-built, which you can preview at this site:
也可以用于地面物件的移动，这时x轴为轨道: It can also be used to move objects on the ground, in which case the lane is considered as the x-axis.
input.arc1.helper: The starting point of this Arc will be the starting point of the generated result and determines the parameters other than the time point and coordinates.
input.arc2.helper: Obviously, you need two Arc's to form a plane.
hint.timingEasingDisp.easing: In this tool, the type of easing function directly determines the tendency of BPM change. Generally speaking, the "In" series is to accelerate from 0, the "Out" series is to decelerate to 0, and the "InOut" series is to accelerate and then decelerate. This tool can't precisely control the BPM extremes. Anyway, try a few more functions and you will understand!
input.params.disp.helper: The total displacement generated at the breakpoint position, which will be divided equally before and after the breakpoint
input.params.standard.helper: Note will be ignored which is earlier than the standard, defaults to 0
input.params.x_limit_range.helper: Format: "left boundary, right boundary", would override the limit mode's boundary
input.params.y_limit_range.helper: Format: "left boundary, right boundary", would override the limit mode's boundary
input.params.image.helper: The black parts of the uploaded image will be converted to Arc drawings. Please don't upload images with transparent backgrounds
input.plane.helper: Vertical x-y plane will make Arc drawings perpendicular to the track (end timing is ignored in this option), horizontal x-t plane will make Arc drawings stretch along the track (y-coordinate constraints are ignored in this option)
input.params.sampling_rate.helper: Recommended range is 0.001-0.01. Lower values give more precise results but generate more Arc objects
input.params.x_offset.helper: Relative to the origin x-axis offset, defaults to 0.0
input.params.y_offset.helper: Relative to the origin y-axis offset, defaults to 0.0
input.params.x_scale.helper: Stretch the generated pattern along the x-axis of the selected plane, default is 1.0
input.params.y_scale.helper: Stretch the generated pattern along the y-axis of the selected plane, default is 1.0
